level.text: Each party to the proceeding, after the close of the record within the time prescribed for post-hearing briefs, or as otherwise directed by the Panel shall serve on all parties and file with the Panel proposed findings of fact and conclusions of law for consideration by the Panel.
The proposed findings of fact and conclusions of law shall be referenced to the record of the proceedings.
The proposed findings of fact and conclusions of law may be included in the post hearing briefs required by this chapter.
